system.description:
The caster can communicate with one type of animal within range when the spell is cast.

  • Type of animal: Ordinary animals or giant versions of ordinary animals may be targeted.

  • Questions: The caster can ask questions of and receive answers from animals of the chosen kind, although the spell doesnâ€™t make animals any more friendly or cooperative than normal (a reaction roll may be required).

  • Services: If an animal is friendly toward the caster, it may perform some favour or service.
